title: The Race Is On to Find the U.K.’s Next Prime Minister
description: Volatility returned to Britain’s financial markets as the Conservative Party once again seeks a new candidate to serve as prime minister.
dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Ravi Mattu, Bernhard Warner, Vivian Giang, Sarah Kessler, Stephen Gandel, Michael J. de la Merced, Lauren Hirsch and Ephrat Livni
media:description: A swift end to a short tenure.
